text: فمن ابتغى وراء ذلك فاو۟لئك هم العادون

translations.translation: but if anyone desires any more than that, they have overstepped the limits;
But those who seek more than this will be transgressors;
but any who seeks to go beyond that, it is indeed they who are the transgressors,
but whoever goes beyond this is a transgressor;
So those who desire more than this – it is they who are the transgressors.
But whosoever seeks beyond that, then it is those who are trespassers.
But he who seeks to go beyond this, these it is that go beyond the limits--
(but whoso seeks after more than that, they are the transgressors),
But whoso seeketh more than that, those are they who are transgressors;
but those who go beyond that limit are transgressors;
And whosoever seeketh beyond that, then it is those who are the trespassers
but whoever seeks beyond that—it is they who are the transgressors)
But those who trespass beyond this are transgressors;-
But whosoever seeks beyond that, then it is those who are trespassers.
But whosoever seeks beyond that, they are the transgressors.
But whoever seeks to go beyond that—these are the transgressors.
But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -
[70:31] but whoever seeks beyond that, those are the infringers, who transgress [the bounds of] what is lawful [stepping] into what is unlawful;
(But whoso seeketh more than that) whoever seeks more than what I have mentioned of wives and slaves, (those are they who are transgressors) from that which is lawful to that which is unlawful;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ } وطلب { وَرَآءَ ذَلِكَ } الذي ذُكر من السراري والأزاج { فَأُوْلَـٰئِكَ } المسرفون المفرطون { هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ } [المعارج: 31] المجاوزون عن مقتضى الحدود الموضوعة بحفظ العفة
